entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries at times heavy beginning near midnight. Risk of snow squalls. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 11:57 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near noon then clearing. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:57 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 11.
